title: Add integration tests for Supervisor delegation and response proxying
description: Add integration coverage for Supervisor delegation, reverse event proxying, and reply routing across app/daemon boundaries.
acceptance_criteria:
- Integration tests cover request delegation and final result return to Supervisor chat.
- Tests cover child clarification question appearing in Supervisor and reply being routed back correctly.
- Tests cover blocker/error propagation from child workspace to Supervisor chat.
- Test suite runs in CI and fails on regression in event correlation or routing.

title: Route user replies from Supervisor chat back into active child subtask
description: Implement reply routing from Supervisor chat back into the active delegated child subtask so all user interaction stays in one place.
acceptance_criteria:
- User reply in Supervisor chat is matched to the correct waiting child task via correlation context.
- If multiple child tasks are waiting, Supervisor asks disambiguation instead of guessing.
- Delivery acknowledgement/status is visible in Supervisor chat after routing.
- If target subtask is no longer active, user gets explicit guidance and recovery options.

title: Reduce supervisor health noise on startup
Add workspace context analysis and target workspace selection for Supervisor
description: Add workspace-context analysis and routing logic that evaluates available workspaces and selects the most relevant target for delegated execution.
acceptance_criteria:
- Routing input includes workspace metadata (repo, branch, capabilities, health/availability).
- Selection logic is deterministic and emits route reasoning for observability/debugging.
- When no route is confidently selected, Supervisor requests clarification in main chat instead of silent failure.
- Routing API contracts are stable and covered by unit tests.

title: Supervisor dispatch: support effort and access_mode
Bridge child workspace events back to Supervisor chat (questions, blockers, status, result)
description: Implement reverse event bridge so child-workspace subtask events are surfaced back into the main Supervisor chat stream.
acceptance_criteria:
- Child events for clarifications, approvals, blockers/errors, progress updates, and final results appear in Supervisor chat.
- Each bridged event includes correlation metadata (subtask/session/workspace) for correct threading.
- Per-subtask event ordering is preserved and duplicate delivery is prevented.
- Bridge failures are surfaced to user as explicit delivery/error events.

title: Adopt beads issue workflow in CodexMonitor
description: Use beads as the canonical task tracker for this repository and keep AGENTS/README guidance aligned.

title: Support optional dedicated supervisor workspace with fast default model
description: Support an optional dedicated Supervisor workspace configured for fast default model execution and orchestration tasks.
acceptance_criteria:
- Configuration flag enables/disables dedicated Supervisor workspace mode.
- When enabled, Supervisor creates or reuses a dedicated workspace with fast model preset.
- If dedicated workspace is unavailable, system falls back to standard workspace selection with clear status.
- Documentation explains when to use dedicated mode and fallback behavior.

title: Autoconnect explicit single workspace in Supervisor global chat
Implement Supervisor single-pane orchestration flow
description: Implement the end-to-end Supervisor-as-Operator flow so users can submit natural-language tasks in Supervisor chat and get the final outcome in the same chat without manual workspace switching.
acceptance_criteria:
- Supervisor accepts plain-language requests and chooses an execution route (workspace delegation or local tool execution).
- If required context is missing, Supervisor asks clarifying questions in the Supervisor chat before dispatch.
- Final outcome is posted back to the same Supervisor thread with execution summary and next action (if any).
- Happy-path task completion requires no manual workspace switching.

title: Expose delegation route and progress visibility in Supervisor UI
description: Expose delegation route and execution progress in Supervisor UI so users can understand where work is running and current state.
acceptance_criteria:
- UI displays selected workspace/tool for each delegated subtask.
- Progress states include queued, running, waiting_for_user, completed, and failed.
- Users can inspect recent subtask events without opening child workspace view.
- State transitions are consistent with backend event stream and survive UI refresh.
